approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the owner's account.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is currently paused.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the total token supply.
